law.history: Repealed 1997 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 44, effective May 30, 1997. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 216, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1994. â€“ Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 159, sec. 4, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 496, sec. 18, effective July 13, 1990.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: : Personal service contracts for advertising, promotional, or public relations services.
